properties.name: camel.component.jasypt.algorithm
properties.description: The algorithm to be used for decryption. Default: PBEWithMD5AndDES

properties.name: camel.component.jasypt.early-decryption-enabled
properties.description: Enable the early properties decryption during Spring Start Up

properties.name: camel.component.jasypt.iv-generator-class-name
properties.description: The initialization vector (IV) generator applied in decryption operations. Default: org.jasypt.iv.

properties.name: camel.component.jasypt.password
properties.description: The master password used by Jasypt for decrypting the values. This option supports prefixes which influence the master password lookup behaviour: sysenv: means to lookup the OS system environment with the given key. sys: means to lookup a JVM system property.

properties.name: camel.component.jasypt.provider-name
properties.description: The class name of the security provider to be used for obtaining the encryption algorithm.

properties.name: camel.component.jasypt.random-iv-generator-algorithm
properties.description: The algorithm for the random iv generator

properties.name: camel.component.jasypt.random-salt-generator-algorithm
properties.description: The algorithm for the salt generator

properties.name: camel.component.jasypt.salt-generator-class-name
properties.description: The salt generator applied in decryption operations. Default: org.jasypt.salt.RandomSaltGenerator
